name: vihaan-learning-platform
description: Interactive 5th grade learning platform with AI-powered remediation and STAAR/MAP test preparation

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static && npm run process-config && npm run optimize
scripts.copy-static: cp -r *.html manifest.json assets config data docs dist/ && cp -r css js subjects dist/
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize-images && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.optimize-images: if command -v imagemin >/dev/null 2>&1; then imagemin assets/images/**/*.{jpg,png,jpeg} --out-dir=dist/assets/images --plugin=webp --plugin=imagemin-mozjpeg --plugin=imagemin-pngquant; else echo 'ImageMin not available, skipping image optimization'; fi
scripts.minify-css: if command -v cleancss >/dev/null 2>&1; then cleancss -o dist/css/main.min.css css/main.css css/responsive.css; else echo 'CleanCSS not available, skipping CSS minification'; fi
scripts.minify-js: if command -v terser >/dev/null 2>&1; then terser js/app.js js/progress.js js/interactive.js js/sw.js --compress --mangle -o dist/js/app.min.js; else echo 'Terser not available, skipping JS minification'; fi
scripts.test:security: npm run security-check && echo 'Security checks passed'
scripts.validate: npm run validate-html && npm run test:security
